name: Cat-A-Strophic
description:
You've done it now! 

You've managed to angry the Queen of the house and now she's out for vengeance! Time to take responsibility for your actions and pay the consequences!

Catch your valuable household objects and safely deposit them into the basket and away from your furious feline. Anything you miss will break! Replacements don't come cheap so put those hands to work!

Controls: If you are using a keyboard:

W, A, S, D --> Controls the Left Hand

Arrow Keys --> Control the Right Hand

If you are using a controller:

Left Analogue Stick --> Controls the Left Hand

Right Analogue Stick --> Controls the Right Hand
